text: The list of shipwrecks in August 1830 includes all ships sunk, foundered, grounded, or otherwise lost during August 1830. ==1 August== ==2 August== ==3 August== ==4 August== ==5 August== ==6 August== ==8 August== ==9 August== ==11 August== ==12 August== ==14 August== ==15 August== ==16 August== ==17 August== ==18 August== ==19 August== ==20 August== ==21 August== ==24 August== ==25 August== ==27 August== ==28 August== ==31 August== ==Unknown date== ==References== 1830-08
